name: ancestor
posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: a person related to you who lived a long time ago

example.eg: There were portraits of his ancestors on the walls of the room.
example.egtrans: 房间墙壁上挂着他祖先的画像。

trans_examp.trans_en: a plant, animal, or object that is related to one existing at a later point in time

example.eg: This wooden instrument is the ancestor of the modern metal flute.
example.egtrans: 这种木质乐器是现代金属长笛的雏形。
